steps.title: Feel free to use emojis in emails if it fits your company culture.
steps.content: Feel free to use emojis in emails if it fits your company culture. If your workplace is pretty informal, you have a good relationship with your colleagues, and you send lots of quick and casual messages, emojis are fine to use. In fact, they can help add a personal touch to work communication, highlight important info, and make your message seem more honest or relatable.
